intro: Chaetosus, commonly known as the sea holly, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its striking blue or purple ray flowers and bristly, spiny leaves. They are popular in horticulture for their ornamental value and ability to attract pollinators.
